en.title: Pushing Boundaries, One Robot at a Time
en.description: From regional champs to world contenders — our team is redefining innovation, teamwork, and passion for STEM.

en.title: Grateful to Our Sponsors for Powering the Journey
en.description: A huge thank-you to the organizations and individuals who make our mission possible — your support drives every line of code and every match we play.

en.title: Competition Season Kickoff
en.description: Our team is gearing up for an exciting competition season. With new designs and improved strategies, we're ready to take on the challenge.
